alert_one.description_one: The files could not be accessed. Please try again.

alert_two.title: Image uploaded successfully
alert_two.description: Your avatar image has been successfully updated.

alert_two.title: Successful update
alert_two.description: The user's data has been updated correctly.

alert_one.title: Attention
alert_one.description: You cannot delete the default avatar image.

overlay_dialog.text_body: Are you sure you want to delete your profile picture?

landing_page.description: Never miss a transaction. Keep control of your cryptocurrencies and receive Smart notifications at the right times. Manage your “Daily Agenda” cryptocurrencies every morning.

alert_one.title: Wallet created successfully
alert_one.description: The wallet has been created correctly.

alert_two.title: Error creating wallet
alert_two.description: There was a problem creating the wallet.

alert_three.title: You cannot delete the current wallet.

pass_code.title: Enter passcode
pass_code.description: The passcode adds an extra layer of security when using the app.

safe_words.title: Safe Words
safe_words.description: These are your keywords. Do not share them with anyone for security reasons.

change_password.title: Enter New Password
change_password.description: The passcode adds an extra layer of security when using the app.

step_one.title: Verifying your account
step_one.description: Enter your email to check if you have an existing account.

alert_one.title: Success
alert_one.description: Verification code sent to your email.

alert_three.title: Mistake
alert_three.description: An account was not found associated with this email.

alert_four.title: Mistake
alert_four.description: There was a problem generating the verification code.

step_two.title: Verify OTP Code
step_two.description: Enter the OTP code sent to your email for verification.

step_three.title: We will proceed to verify your safe words
step_three.description: Enter the 12 safe words in the same order in which they were given to you.

validate_input.safe_words: You have now added 12 words. Proceed to verify them.

alert_three.title: Wrong wordse
alert_three.description: The words entered do not match. Remember to enter them in the same order in which they were given to you.

step_four.title: Account verified successfully! You can now change your password.

section_one.title: Cryp Wallet: Your Trusted Crypto Wallet
section_one.description: Founded in 2024 by Sebastian Mena Hinestroza, CrypWallet is a progressive application (PWA) that allows users to manage, buy, sell, transfer and receive a wide variety of cryptocurrencies safely and efficiently.

section_two.title: Why Choose CrypWallet?
section_two.description: At CrypWallet, we take the security of your account and our clients' money very seriously. users. We offer:

container_one.title: Manage Your Cryptocurrencies
container_one.description: With CrypWallet, you can manage all your cryptocurrencies in one place, with total safety and ease.

container_two.title: Secure Transactions
container_two.description: Carry out transactions of purchase, sale, transfer and receipt of cryptocurrencies quickly and securely with CrypWallet.

download_app.title: No installation prompt
download_app.description: Your browser does not support the installation prompt.

sign_in.title: Sign In
sign_in.description: The password secures access to your account.

alert_two.title: Account disabled
alert_two.description: Your account has been disabled due to multiple failed login attempts. Please try to recover your account to restore access.

alert_three.title: Authentication Error
alert_three.description: The user is not registered. Please verify your information and try again.

validation_sign_in.email_message: It is not a valid mail

name_last_name.pattern: Only letters are allowed and no white spaces are allowed.

email.pattern: It is not a valid email

password.pattern: The password must contain exactly 6 numerical digits

alert_three.title: Registration error
alert_three.description: A user with this email address already exists.

modal_safe_words.title: Safety Words
modal_safe_words.description: Next, we will provide you with the passwords for your account. These words are crucial for recovering your account in case you need it. To ensure the security of your account, we strongly recommend that you keep these words in a safe place and do not share them with anyone under any circumstances.
